item.title: Creating a Custom Diffuse Lighting Model in Unity - Tutorial
item.description: If you are familiar with Unity 4, you may know that the default shader provided by it was based on a lighting model called the Lambertian reflectance. This article shows you how you can create a shader with a custom lighting model and explains the mathematics involved along with the implementation.
